price: Sila inni yeroo wanti qabroota keessa jiran hundi baafaman sana hin beekuu?
arabic: ۞ أَفَلَا يَعۡلَمُ إِذَا بُعۡثِرَ مَا فِي ٱلۡقُبُورِ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: afalā yaʿlamu idhā buʿ'thira mā fī al-qubūri
